ygData.subject: Re: Band of rodcet life
ygData.msgSnippet: The Torque sucks! It should have include wis and int casters!!! Enough ranting, Holyomen got the better deal IMO, the torque only gives you a little AC boast
ygData.messageBody:
The Torque sucks! It should have include wis and int casters!!!

Enough ranting, Holyomen got the better deal IMO, the torque only gives you a
little AC boast and and you don't use mana much anyway.

Fesse Estasis, Cleric of the 42nd KOS circle.
